description: Bushy Bluestem is an amazing species of grass, aptly named for its tufted stems and silvery-blue blades. It is native to the grasslands of North America and is incredibly tolerant of changing conditions. The roots of Bushy Bluestem can reach depths of 4-6 feet, providing incredible drought resistance and soil stability. Its dense growth provides vital habitat and groundcover to the native bees, birds, and animals of the area while its distinctive presence gives character to the savanna landscape. With its beautiful and resilient nature, Bushy Bluestem is truly a remarkable plant.
